StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCandidateProfessedExam]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID int, @ExamDate date.me, @ProfessedExamType char(1), @ExamEnteredDate date.me, @ExamScore .oat, @ExamScore2 int = NULL, @ExamScore3 int = NULL, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = @ProfessedExamType AND EXAM_DATE = @ExamDate AND EXAM_ENTERED_DATE = @ExamEnteredDate) BEGIN --- UPDATE THE EXAM UPDATE CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM SET EXAM_SCORE = @ExamScore, EXAM_SCORE2 = @ExamScore2, EXAM_SCORE3 = @ExamScore3, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonID AND PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = @ProfessedExamType AND EXAM_DATE = @ExamDate AND EXAM_ENTERED_DATE = @ExamEnteredDate END ELSE BEGIN --- INSERT THE EXAM INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE, EXAM_DATE, EXAM_ENTERED_DATE, EXAM_SCORE, EXAM_SCORE2, EXAM_SCORE3, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@PersonID, @ProfessedExamType, @ExamDate, @ExamEnteredDate, @ExamScore, @ExamScore2, @ExamScore3, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END
